stories.headline: To share or not to share
stories.summary: Journalists face dilemmas on whether to share data with others, balancing transparency against organizational interests.

stories.headline: Analysis shows feds' claims about charity
stories.summary: Social network analysis tools reveal links of the Islamic American Relief Agency to terror activities, highlighting investigative techniques using data.

stories.headline: Peace Accidents
stories.summary: Military aviation accident data reveals insights into safety issues, stressing the importance of data analysis in investigative reporting.

stories.headline: Uncovering an age-old scam
stories.summary: An investigation into eBay sales of Florida swampland exposes repeated real estate scams facilitated by online auctions.

stories.headline: Big bucks flow to rural areas
stories.summary: Analysis of Homeland Security grants in Iowa reveals questionable allocation patterns, spotlighting discrepancies in rural versus urban funding.
